name: Kinetex Machina
description: It's the 22nd century; body augmentation is a common part of society. Humanity's limits change constantly, creating an unheard of sense of optimism and possibility. Every four years, nations put aside their conflicts in the spirit of harmony and competition in the Zenith Games. They enter not to show the world what's possible, but what it might become.

skinlines.name: Zenith Games
skinlines.description: It's 2122, a year of firsts for the Zenith Games. Robot referees are taking to the field, the sport of Hammerjack is making its competitive debut, and after years of talks, augmented humans are finally allowed to compete. All that's left is seeing who will win.
